scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.build:sea:blob: npm run build:sea && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('./build',{recursive:true});" && node --experimental-sea-config sea.config.json
scripts.pack:sea:mac: npm run build:sea:blob && cp "$(command -v node)" ./build/usb-llm-launcher && codesign --remove-signature ./build/usb-llm-launcher || true && npx -y postject@1.0.0-alpha.6 ./build/usb-llm-launcher NODE_SEA_BLOB ./build/usb-llm-launcher.blob --macho-segment-name NODE_SEA --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && codesign --sign - ./build/usb-llm-launcher
scripts.pack:sea:win: npm run build:sea:blob && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$exe=(Get-Command node).Source; Copy-Item $exe ./build/usb-llm-launcher.exe; npx -y postject@1.0.0-alpha.6 ./build/usb-llm-launcher.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB ./build/usb-llm-launcher.blob --force --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2"
